org.jetel.graph.runtime

Class TrackingLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.runtime.TrackingLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.management.NotificationListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GraphTrackingLogger, JobflowTrackingLogger

    public abstract class TrackingLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.management.NotificationListener
    Console logger of all tracking information. This class is JMX notification listener. ETL graphs and jobflows have different tracking logger, see GraphTrackingLogger and JobflowTrackingLogger.
